EmailTemplate.subject: Why should you upgrade your display’s to Honeywell’s DU-875?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell's DU-875, installed by Pentastar Aviation, is an easy cost-effective upgrade that will elevate the performance of your cockpit, providing the most advanced technologies in safety, situational awareness and enhanced navigation capabilities.
Need more reasons to upgrade? Replace one or more of your DU-870 displays and you’ll experience:
- Reduced cost of ownership - Increased display reliability - Reduced weight (meaning less fuel consumption) - Full cockpit integration - Growth plan that takes advantage of future technologies and applications - Increase aircraft equity
Contact Pentastar today for more information about the DU-875 upgrade and inquire about having them come to you for the install to further eliminate your aircraft downtime.
